description: Come stay in a historic brownstone located in Park Slope, Brooklyn, elected best neighborhood of NYC!  Endless yummy food, vibrant nightlife, historic churches, and sightseeing within an easy walking distance.  Metro is within 5min walk, taking 20min to Manhattan, also with direct service to other trendy neighborhoods such as Williamsburg.  Prospect park, preferred by many over Central Park, is 1 block walk.
name: Friendly and well located place to get away
review: A comfortable tiny spot in the heart of Park Slope. It's essentially a hallway turned into an apartment. Tristan was friendly and helpful, but construction noise outside and uneven wifi made it uncomfortable for work. Fine for a night or two.
